title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table and displaying them in a dynamic text item or data/text item, the format of the datetime values is inconsistent.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in the item. Compare the displayed format between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
